decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Proposed Site Block Plan as Existing drawing no.P102 Rev A, Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no.P110 Rev A, Proposed First Floor Plan drawing no.P111 Rev A, Proposed Loft Floor Plan drawing no.P112 Rev A, Proposed Roof Floor Plan drawing no.P113 Rev A, Front and Rear Proposed Elevation Plan drawing no.P120 Rev A, Section AA and Side Proposed Elevation Plan drawing no.P121 Rev A
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)(Updated).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19) policy DAA London Plan policy D6 and National Planning Policy Framework 2023 (Updated)- section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
description: Single storey side/rear (wraparound) extension (following demolition of existing conservatory)
